feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 06:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -23
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:17 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:17 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:17 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
